reviewText:
Loved it,i watch bear all day while earning money from home!!
http://VisitEarnings.com/?user=47060
What can I say, Bear Grylls is the Man!!!  If you want to learn from a solid, experienced survival expert...go no further!!!

I bought Man VS Wild Season 4 & 5 . I was really disappointed at Man VS Wild Close Calls!!! ! It has all but 1 episode from the other 2 DVD's  Season 4 & 5.
Don't waste your money unless you haven't seen the other 2. They should tell you specifically if you watched  4 & 5 - don't waste your money or time!
Disgusting eating shots but hey, that's Bear Gryllis! Why won't he carry an extra sock each time instead of needing to use his used socks, hmm
